CUSTOM - change pogodroid email to lower.SYNTAX: command -v sed >/dev/null && pconf=/data/data/com.mad.pogodroid/shared_prefs/com.mad.pogodroid_preferences.xml && em=$(sed -ne '/user_id/p' $pconf |sed -e 's,    <string name="user_id">,,' -e 's,</string>,,') && lem=$(echo $em|sed -e 'y/ABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ/abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz/') && sed -i "s,$em,$lem,g" $pconf && echo yes || echo no
